channel.title: Gbif regions on GBIF Data Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Gbif regions on GBIF Data Blog

item.title: GBIF Regional Statistics - 2020
item.description: I was asked to prepare some statistics for the GBIF regional regional meetings being held virtually this year. This blog post is a companion for those meetings. You can watch a video presentation of the preparation of these meetings here. The presentation of this blog post starts here. The Latin America and Caribbean virtual nodes meeting 2020 will be on 18 - 20 May 2020 The Africa virtual nodes meeting 2020 will be on 10 - 12 June 2020 GBIF introduced a regional framework across the GBIF Network a little more than a decade ago, with groups based on clusters of national participants.
